text: Dneprovsky () is a rural locality (a khutor) in Sergiyevskoye Rural Settlement of Giaginsky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 175 as of 2018. There are 3 streets. == Geography == The khutor is located 6 km south-west from Sergiyevskoye, 36 km south-east from Giaginskaya and 24 km north-east from Maykop, on the right bank of the Gachucha River. == Ethnicity == The khutor is inhabited by Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Giaginsky District
title: Dneprovsky
